issues: No withdrawal mechanism for funds paid to the contract, exposing funds to potential loss if the contract has errors.
Fixed timestamps for effective date and delivery date can lead to future issues depending on actual timelines.
The 'canTerminate' and 'terminateAgreement' functions are not implemented, which may hinder the ability to manage exceptional conditions.
recommendations: Implement a withdrawal mechanism to allow the seller to safely withdraw the funds paid to the contract or include escrow functionality.
Consider using a flexible date management system rather than fixed timestamps to handle delivery and effective dates based on external parameters.
Complete the implementation of the 'canTerminate' and 'terminateAgreement' functions to allow for contract termination under specified conditions.
